ca.weblite.shared.components.table

Class TableModel.TableModelEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codename1.ui.events.ActionEvent
      • ca.weblite.shared.components.table.TableModel.TableModelEvent
  • Enclosing interface:
    TableModel

    public static class TableModel.TableModelEvent
extends ActionEvent

    An event fired by a table model when the model changes. Three event types INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE.
